page.title: 13LALEHAM SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: On Wednesday 12th June 1985 children in class 7 of {Laleham School} made a survey of classes 1_9.We wanted to find out how children travelled to school,how many brothers and sisters they had and what kind of house they lived in.Here are some of the results from the survey. { 169} children travelled to school that day by car,{34}walked and {24} cycled. { 75}lived in a detatched house,{110}in semi_detatched houses,{14}in bungalows,{18}in terraced houses and {10}in a flat. { 15}of the children came from families with 5 children,{17}from those with 4 children,{57}from those with 3 children,{120}children had either 1 brother or sister and{18}children came from families where they were the only children.
